name: Hellwatch: Prelude
description:
"Hellwatch" is an exhilarating action game where you take on the role of a defender of the Soulforge, a celestial structure that turns demonic souls into weapons. You'll battle insane creatures that devour anyone in their path, and you'll find yourself in their line of fire. Your goal is to survive for as long as possible, as the duration of your life depends on it.

Survival will be challenging, and you'll need to constantly adapt and utilize all your skills to stay alive. Within the Soulforge lie various items destined to grant new powers and abilities to their wielder. You'll have to make decisions about which equipment to use when things don't go as planned.

Among the chosen defenders, there are both virtuous individuals ready to save everyone and thugs willing to do whatever it takes to complete the mission. Decide who you'll be, and remember that you're far from perfect.

Despite being far from ideal, more like a societal outcast, you'll receive the power of a celestial guardian, which will not only prevent your death in the first few seconds but also compel you to reassess your life values. Amidst the threat of death, every decision becomes much more intriguing.

In "Soulforge: Ruins of the Infernal Realm," there's no permanence. Each time, you'll be thrown into a situation where any plans can be cast aside. Trust your intuition or rely on luck. You have an eternity at your disposal.

  • Unique Game World Concept: Players defend a celestial structure that turns demonic souls into weapons, creating a captivating world full of dangers and mysteries.
  • Intense Combat: Players will battle insane creatures ready to devour anyone in their path. Battles will be intense and require constant adaptation and use of various skills.
  • Randomly Generated Gameplay: Lack of permanence ensures a unique experience each time a player starts a new game. This adds an element of unpredictability and challenge, forcing players to rely on their intuition and instincts.
  • Equipment and Skills: The game features various items that grant new powers and abilities to the player. Choosing equipment and developing skills allows players to customize their playstyle and adapt to changing conditions.
  • Moral Choices and Character: Players must decide who they will be in this world—defenders of good or individuals willing to commit cruel acts for survival. This choice affects the storyline and surrounding characters.
  • Story and Mysteries: Players will uncover the mysteries of the game world, delving into an engaging plot and discovering new aspects of the game universe.
